com.github.arachnidium.core.components

Class ComponentFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.arachnidium.core.components.ComponentFactory

  • public final class ComponentFactory
extends Object
    This proxy factory creates instances of WebdriverComponent subclasses

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <T extends WebdriverComponent>
      T      		 getComponent(Class<T> required, org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver driver)
      Creates objects of the class which extends WebdriverComponent by the default constructor WebdriverComponent.WebdriverComponent(WebDriver).
      static <T extends WebdriverComponent>
      T      		 getComponent(Class<T> required, org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver driver, Class<?>[] types, Object[] args)
      Creates objects of the class which extends WebdriverComponent by constructor that differs from WebdriverComponent.WebdriverComponent(WebDriver).

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getComponent

        public static <T extends WebdriverComponent> T getComponent(Class<T> required,
                                                            org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver driver)
        Creates objects of the class which extends WebdriverComponent by the default constructor WebdriverComponent.WebdriverComponent(WebDriver).
        Parameters:
        required - Class which extends WebdriverComponent
        driver - WebDriver instance which has to be wrapped
        Returns:
        instance required class which extends WebdriverComponent
        See Also:
        WebdriverComponent

      • getComponent

        public static <T extends WebdriverComponent> T getComponent(Class<T> required,
                                                            org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver driver,
                                                            Class<?>[] types,
                                                            Object[] args)
        Creates objects of the class which extends WebdriverComponent by constructor that differs from WebdriverComponent.WebdriverComponent(WebDriver). Although, this constructor should have WebDriver as the first parameter.
        Parameters:
        required - Class which extends WebdriverComponent
        driver - driver WebDriver instance which has to be wrapped
        types - is a Class[] without WebDriver.class
        args - is a Object[] without WebDriver instance
        Returns:
        instance required class which extends WebdriverComponent
        See Also:
        WebdriverComponent
